title: Trisolaris
description: Trisolaris is #1 Dex on the Aurora engine, an EVM compatible blockchain running in the NEAR ecosystem.

title: Ref.Finance
description: Ref Finance is one of the core projects in the DeFi ecosystem on NEAR. Its main objective is to bring together the core components of DeFi, namely, decentralized exchange (DEX).

title: Burrow
description: Burrow is a decentralized, non-custodial, autonomous money market similar in nature to Aave and Compound.

title: Jumbo
description: Jumbo Exchange is the one-stop solution for everyone seeking an ungoverned decentralized solution.

title: Aurigami
description: Aurigami is a decentralised, non-custodial liquidity protocol. Enables users to effortlessly lend, borrow, and earn interest with their digital assets.

title: Bastion
description: Bastion is an algorithmic, DeFi lending protocol on Aurora, NEARâ€™s gas-less EVM layer.

title: Wannaswap
description: Wannswap is one of the first AMM DEX built on Aurora EVM of the NEAR blockchain.

title: Polaris Finance
description: The first algorithmic stablecoin on Aurora chain, pegged to the price of 1 NEAR via seigniorage.
